info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued November 20 at 1:10PM CST until November 20 at 3:30PM CST by NWS San Angelo TX
info.description:
FFWSJT
The National Weather Service in San Angelo has extended the
* Flash Flood Warning for... Northwestern Kimble County in west central Texas... Eastern Sutton County in west central Texas...
* Until 330 PM CST.
* At 110 PM CST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 4 and 7 inches of rain have fallen today. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Roosevelt and I-10 Near The Sutton-Kimble County Line.
This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 419 and 441.
This includes the following Low Water Crossings... County Road 260 crossing North Llano River and River Road crossing North Llano River.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 3:30 PM CST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 3:30 PM CST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 3:30 PM CST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 3:30 PM CST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
